title: 【海上颱風警報】輕度颱風「山陀兒」海上警報已於本日08時30分發布，請注意！The Central Weather Bureau Typhoon Watch Advisory #18【 KRATHON 】
content:
分類： 行政公告
來源： 學務處生活輔導組 - 郭詩妘 - kikiguo@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話03-8906227
對象： 全校教職員_全校學生
標題： 【海上颱風警報】輕度颱風「山陀兒」海上警報已於本日08時30分發布，請注意！The Central Weather Bureau Typhoon Watch Advisory #18【 KRATHON 】
日期： Sun, 29 Sep 2024 09:48:34 +0800
附檔： 【山陀兒】颱風動態圖.png (80 KB)   【山陀兒】颱風路徑潛勢圖.png (155 KB)   
親愛的師長與同學大家好：
中央氣象局已於今(29)日08時30分發布輕度颱風【山陀兒】海上颱風警報，根據氣象局最新觀測資料顯 示，【山陀兒】颱風中心目前位置在北緯 18.6 度，東經 124.3 度，即在鵝鑾鼻的東南方約 510 公里之處，其向西北西轉西北移動，對巴士海峽將構成威脅，此颱風未來強度有增強且暴風圈有擴大的趨勢。。
提醒本校全體師生：
隨時注意颱風動態並提早做好防颱準備，並避免山區及溪邊、海邊等戶外活動；預定辦理(參加)戶外活動者，請密切注意颱風動態，必要時改變行程或提早結束。
颱風最新動態請隨時留意中央氣象局網頁公告，網址https://www.cwa.gov.tw/V8/C/P/Typhoon/TY_WARN.html
～ 學務處關心您 ～

Dear all
The Central Weather Bureau has issued Typhoon Watch Advisory #18 for Typhoon 【KRATHON】as it currently situated over waters and is quickly approaching.
We kindly remind our staff and students to make your storm preparations early. Also please refrain from engaging in any outdoor activities, especially in mountainous areas or any area near bodies of water. Organizers and participants of any outdoor activity/event should also very pay close attention to the path of the storm and make arrangements in advance, so that if needs be, changes in routes or ending times of the activity/event can be timely communicated.
The latest on the path of the storm can be accessed at any time on The Central Weather Bureau’s website from the webpage below:
https://www.cwa.gov.tw/V8/C/P/Typhoon/TY_WARN.html

~The Student Living Services Divsion cares about your safety~
